t: Amazon.com : essence | Satin Touch Blush | 20 Satin Love : Beauty & Personal Care
s: A little goes a long way. I have high end blushes that aren't as beautiful as this. I got the color Satin Love and it is a beautiful nude rose shade. I am light complected and I feel like it will suit me in my fair winter months, as well as these summer months when I have a bit of a tan.
